title: SURPRISE PARTY TWITCH SKIN
body: as a {{champion:29}} twitch main there not alot of skin options and the skins there are, are pretty cheesy the animation never changed its all this green goo so i thought a 1350RP skin or a 1850RP skin would be an awesome addition to twitch. look at the picture i had attached

replies.body: Do u get Twitch and the skin? becuse i dont own twitch!!! {{champion:29}}  {{item:1038}} {{item:1038}} {{item:1038}} + {{item:3072}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3086}} = {{champion:29}}
:D *.* Instabuy, but still waiting for Battle Bunny Rengar and Talon :l
cool I reckon it should happen
i think this might be cool
